citations.title: BYD DOLPHIN: Agile and Versatile
citations.summary: The BYD Dolphin features a DC charging time of 29 minutes to charge from 30% to 80% and includes a standard heat pump and Vehicle-to-Load (V2L) function, enabling 3.3kW external discharge for use as a mobile power station. Its integrated system, which includes components such as the Drive Motor, Motor Controller, and On-Board Charger, achieves an impressive efficiency of 89%. This combination of features enhances the vehicle's versatility for various lifestyle applications, such as outdoor activities.

citations.title: BYD DOLPHIN: Agile and Versatile
citations.summary: The BYD DOLPHIN features a high-efficiency integrated heat pump that serves as the industry's first direct cooling and heating system for power batteries, enhancing thermal efficiency by up to 15% in winter conditions. This system utilizes residual heat from various sources, including the surroundings and the powertrain, and operates effectively across a wide temperature range. Additionally, the top variants include a panoramic sunroof with high-strength double-layer glazing for improved insulation and a 97% sunshade for enhanced comfort in hot weather.

citations.title: The All-New BYD ATTO 3 Debuts in the UK
citations.summary: The BYD ATTO 3, utilizing the e-Platform 3.0, features the BYD Blade Battery and a high-efficiency heat pump that enhances thermal efficiency by up to 20% in winter through a direct cooling and heating system for power batteries. This innovative thermal management system ensures optimal performance across various temperatures, while the lithium iron phosphate (LFP) battery offers superior safety, thermal stability, and durability, achieving an overall system efficiency of 89%. Additionally, the LFP battery is cobalt-free, contributing to its sustainability.

citations.title: BYD SEAL arrives in Europe Setting the Standard ...
citations.summary: The BYD SEAL features a high-efficiency heat pump system that regulates battery temperature and passenger compartment climate with minimal energy use, capable of operating in temperatures from -30°C to 60°C. Its CTB (Cell-to-Body) battery system not only serves as an energy source but also enhances structural integrity, achieving a torsional stiffness of 40,500 Nm/degree, which improves handling, comfort, and safety. Additionally, this technology optimizes space utilization by integrating the battery directly with the vehicle's body, lowering its height by approximately 15mm.

citations.title: BYD Unveils Super e-Platform with Megawatt Flash ...
citations.summary: BYD has introduced its Super e-Platform, which features next-generation automotive-grade silicon carbide (SiC) power chips with a voltage rating of up to 1500V, marking them as the highest voltage-rated mass-produced automotive-grade SiC chips in the industry. The platform supports a megawatt charging capability (1000 kW) and achieves a peak charging speed of 2 kilometers per second, allowing for 400 kilometers of range to be charged in just 5 minutes. Additionally, it includes a groundbreaking 30,000 RPM motor, providing a single-module single-motor power output of 580 kW, enhancing electric vehicle performance significantly.

citations.title: BYD introduces sporty BYD SEALION 7 to European market
citations.summary: The BYD SEALION 7, now available in Europe, features a spacious trunk with a volume of 520 liters (1,789 liters with rear seats down) and seats five occupants. It is equipped with an 82.5 kWh BYD Blade Battery (LFP) that supports 150 kW DC and up to 11 kW AC charging, allowing for a DC charging time of 24 minutes from 30% to 80%. The vehicle incorporates a highly efficient heat pump and a compact electric drivetrain that enhances efficiency and packaging, alongside a structural design that provides exceptional torsional stiffness.
